title: 3 LEVELS - 5 Bed 4 Bath HOUSE with Basement - Parking Available
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 174186480', 'Rent: $5,600 / Month', 'Beds: 5', 'Bath: 4', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'WOW!', 'BIG 5 BED HOUSE located on Sutherland Road on the Brighton / Brookline border!', ' Single family - PET FRIENDLY - in beautiful neighborhood conveniently located between BC and BU.', 'Recently RENOVATED 5 bed, 4 bath.', 'New plumbing, electrical, windows, HVAC systems, new kitchen and bathrooms, hardwood floors and hybrid hot water tank.', 'Stainless steel appliances,  IN UNIT LAUNDRY.', '3 levels of living space plus basement for storage.', 'Great location close to public transportation.', 'Walk to Cleveland Circle or Commonwealth Ave.', 'May consider dogs for additional $75 / month.', 'ON BC BUS ROUTE.', 'Contact Chris to schedule your showing this week!', 'For inquiries..', 'Please email Chris with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'ChrisP @ <URL>          860 - 309 - 8511', 'Tram: B Sutherland Road (0.10 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Englewood Ave (0.32 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.47 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Reservoir (0.37 mi)', 'Tram: C Englewood Avenue (0.25 mi)', 'Tram: D Reservoir (0.38 mi)', 'Bus: 65 Washington St @ Commonwealth Ave (0.33 mi)', '174186480', 'FEATURES', 'Central Air', 'Deleaded', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Duplex', 'Exposed Brick', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Microwave', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'New Appliances', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Storage', 'Christopher Puzacke', 'Licensed Real Estate Professional', '107 Brighton Ave Boston, MA 02134', 'Cell: 860.309.8511', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
